thread.title: Excellent location and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Excellent location and friendly staff - Review of Radisson Martinique on Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: marianchew0326
title: Excellent location and friendly staff
text: My family enjoyed our stay at the Radisson very much. The hotel receptionist was able to give us a room even though we arrived early. The doormen and the housekeeping staff are always courteous and friendly. The water pressure in the shower was good. The room was clean and tidy and well lit. There is a supermarket diagonally across from the hotel. Restaurants are everywhere and the subway is just outside of the hotel. Super convenient and easy walk to most major sites we wanted to visit.
